title: Chairman Senate condemns Khuzdar school bus targeting
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 21 (APP): Senate Chairman Syed Yusuf Raza Gilani Wednesday strongly condemned targeting school bus at Zero Point in Khuzdar, which killed three children and injured many others.
In a statement, he said he was deeply saddened by the tragic incident. He called the targeting of innocent children a cowardly, cruel, and shameful act of terrorism. “This painful tragedy has saddened the whole nation,” he added.
Gilani offered his condolences to the families who lost their loved ones and said the nation stands with them in this difficult time. He also prayed for the speedy recovery of the injured students and urged authorities to provide them with the best medical care.
He said those responsible for the attack would be punished without delay and emphasized the need for strong steps to stop such attacks in the future.
